channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Shazam-Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Shazam-Android

item.title: CVE-2019-8791|2024-08-04T21:31:37.471Z -- apple -- shazam-android
item.description: An issue existed in the parsing of URL schemes. This issue was addressed with improved URL validation. This issue is fixed in Shazam Android App Version 9.25.0, Shazam iOS App Version 12.11.0. Processing a maliciously crafted URL may lead to an open redirect.

item.title: CVE-2019-8792|2024-08-04T21:31:37.523Z -- apple -- shazam-android
item.description: An injection issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue is fixed in Shazam Android App Version 9.25.0, Shazam iOS App Version 12.11.0. Processing a maliciously crafted URL may lead to arbitrary javascript code execution.
